Title: Increases the amount of funding permissible for the investment in a cannabis private debt or equity fund
Summary: Increases the amount of funding permissible for the investment in a cannabis private debt or equity fund to $300,000,000.
LawCode: Amd ยง99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to increasing the amount of funding permissible for the investment in a cannabis private debt or equity fund
